synopsis.p: searches for terms and associates a category identifier using ToMap.

description.p: searches for the terms specified by yateaFile (in YaTeA XML output format) and classifies them using the ToMap classifier specified by tomapClassifier.

param-doc.name: lemmaKeys
param-doc.p: Compare candidate and proxy terms by their lemma. By default compares their surface forms.
This parameter also affects how significant components and token heads are matched.

param-doc.name: onlyMNP
param-doc.p: Only search for maximal noun phrase terms. By default searches for all terms.

param-doc.name: explanationFeaturePrefix
param-doc.p: Prefix of feature names for the assignment explanation. Features are concept-synonym, significant-head, candidate-head.
If not set, the features will not be stored.

param-doc.name: scoreFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the similarity between the candidate and proxy terms.
If not set, the similarity will not be stored.

param-doc.name: conceptFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the concept identifier.
If not set, the concept identifier will not be stored.

param-doc.name: yateaFile
param-doc.p: Path to the file containing extracted terms. This file may be generated with YateaExtractor.

param-doc.name: tomapClassifier
param-doc.p: Path to the file containing proxy terms, their associated identifiers and syntactic structure. Generate this file with TomapTrain.
